name: Super Serve them Coffee
description:
Super Serve them Coffee

Made for the Coffee Jam

It's up to you to run this coffee joint! Take the customer's orders, get paid, and upgrade your small joint into a staple franchise! 

Instructions:

Click and drag from an item source on your shelves to spawn an item into your shop. Drag coffee bean bags into the coffee brewer to brew them into coffee. Drag ingredients and toppings into the coffee to enhance the flavor! When an order is finished, move it onto the customer's plate. Try to complete the orders perfectly!
